# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the matrix (the space between the cells).

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is the background color used to fill the space between cells or the space behind any non-opaque cells. The default background color is the color returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor] method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/controlColor].

## Modifying Graphics Attributes

- **cellBackgroundColor**: The background color of the matrix’s cells.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean that indicates whether the matrix draws its background.
- **drawsCellBackground**: A Boolean that indicates whether the matrix draws the background within each of its cells.
